          <title>
            <string language="en">Crystal structure of diamond - repeating unit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kristallstruktur des Diamanten - Wiederholen der 
Maßeinheit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Structure en cristal de diamant - répétition de 
l'unité</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estrutura de cristal do diamante - repetindo a 
unidade</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Struttura di cristallo del diamante - ripetere 
unità</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δομή κρυστάλλου του διαμαντιού - που επαναλαμβάνει τη 
μονάδα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estructura cristalina del diamante - relanzar la 
unidad</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is the second of two illustrations showing the three-dimensional crystal structure of a diamond.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Carbon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">crystal structure</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Repeating unit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Single crystal solid</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist die Sekunde von zwei Abbildungen, 
welche die dreidimensionale Kristallstruktur eines Diamanten zeigen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est la seconde de deux illustrations montrant la
structure en cristal tridimensionnelle d'un diamant.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este é o segundo de duas ilustrações que 
mostram a estrutura de cristal tridimensional de um diamante.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è il secondo di due illustrazioni che 
mostrano la struttura di cristallo tridimensionale di un diamante.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι η δεύτερη δύο απεικονίσεων που εμφανίζουν
τρισδιάστατη δομή κρυστάλλου ενός διαμαντιού.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Éste es el segundo de dos ilustraciones que 
muestran la estructura cristalina tridimensional de un diamante.</string>
          </description>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
